meanings.definition: The state or quality of being peaked or pointed.
meanings.sent1: The peakedness of the mountain made it difficult to climb.
meanings.sent2: The peakedness of the roof allowed rainwater to easily run off.
meanings.sent3: The peakedness of the hat made it look like a wizard's hat.
meanings.sent4: The peakedness of the pencil tip reminded her of a sharp arrow.
meanings.sent5: The peakedness of the star's shape stood out against the night sky.

meanings.definition: The condition of reaching a peak or highest point.
meanings.sent1: The team celebrated the peakedness of their performance.
meanings.sent2: The peakedness of the stock market brought excitement to investors.
meanings.sent3: The peakedness of the cake tower made it a challenge to transport.
meanings.sent4: The peakedness of her career was marked by the award ceremony.
meanings.sent5: The peakedness of the roller coaster ride left them breathless with joy.
